sentences.en: After spring cleaning, 　 all was shipshape and Bristol fashion.
sentences.cn: 春季大扫除之后一切都整整齐齐.

sentences.en: Give me the gift of a pair of drip - dry, shipshape, tiptop socks.
sentences.cn: 给我一双滴乾的 、 整洁的 、 最好的短袜作礼物.

sentences.en: He glanced around .'This courtyard was her pride and joy and she liked to keep shipshape.
sentences.cn: 这个院子是她的快乐和骄傲,她喜欢把院子保持得整洁有序.

sentences.en: I get the house all shipshape while he is away.
sentences.cn: 他不在的时候,我把房子打扫得乾乾净净,整整齐齐.

sentences.en: I got the house all shipshape while he was away.
sentences.cn: 他不在的时候,我把房子打扫得干干净净,整整齐齐.
让我们把这所房子收拾干净。

sentences.en: Six sticky sucker sticks. Sure the ship shipshape, sir.
sentences.cn: 六个粘性吸管被粘住了. 但是船还是很整洁干净的, 先生.
但是船还是很整洁干净的, 先生.

sentences.en: The house only needs an occasional coat of paint to keep it shipshape.
sentences.cn: 房子只需偶尔粉刷一次就可以保持整洁。

sentences.en: Those books are shipshape on the shelf.
sentences.cn: 书整齐有序地摆在书架上.

sentences.en: We try to keep the ship shipshape.
sentences.cn: 我们尽量保持船井井有条.

words.tran_cn: 井然有序的；整整齐齐的；整洁干净的
